summary: Keeps Derkeethus from running back home after marriage or recruitment in the Blades faction.
descriptionHtml:
Derkeethus Marriage quick fix
by Axhoff

Derkeethus will:

-Stay at the player's home of choice after he's married.
-Stay at Skyhaven Temple when recruited for the Blades.

Users of the latest “Unofficial Skyrim Patch” or “Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch” do NOT need this mod.

I will leave the mod up for those that, for whatever reason, are not playing with the Unofficial Patch installed.

I will not be porting this mod over to Skyrim Special Edition.
author: Axhoff
